AovsBQnhkt3tF2TEi-ZIcw.text: Small Cafe but was able to accommodate all 8 of us and the food was awesome. Service was awesome as well. Definitely recommend this spot. We had a variety and the haggis.  It was overall great!

Xv3ninZdnKe5vK08W2QJcw.text: Overpriced food that thinks it's way fancier than it really is.  My food looked like it arrived on a small blackboard, and I saw another table get their order (soup maybe?) in what looked like flower pots.  Use bowls and plates, goddamn.  Medium rare steak was too chewy and didn't feel like a proper medium rare.  Haggis bon bons had the smooth texture of raw meat inside the admittedly nice fried dough.  And for some reason when I asked for a water they gave (and charged me!) for a bottle instead of just giving me tap like a sensible place would.  Absolute robbers, this place.  It's on the same street as the Scran and Scallie and Taisteal and charging the same price for worse food.  Avoid.

khXHr0jnRcskhz6LwjYdMg.text: A very nice and cosy place to nip into in Stockbridge. I had a cappuccino slice, which I thought was unusual, but tasted delicious. My friend had an americano and a mini mac 'n' cheese which she said she loved. Good pricing, nice ambiance, great scran!

photos.caption: Photo of The Kilted Kitchen - Edinburgh, United Kingdom
